description: Women told to "arch their backs" to reach supermarket shelves and raise a knee "for extra intrigue".
title: Outrage as Italian TV show gives 'sexy shopping' advice
title_page: Outrage as Italian TV show gives 'sexy shopping' advice - BBC News
maintext: Bianca Guaccero, presenter of Detto Fatto (which translates as no sooner said than done), also apologised "on behalf of my whole team", adding: "As I have always done in my life, I will make sure that this never happens again."
